Chi2 from pmt_distrib.py (avoid problems with nan in low stat or single occupied bin plots) but reducing the chi2 bin count cut to zero. So for such histos the chi2 is a propa statistical “chi2” but nevertheless still provides an indicator of agreement between distributions.
